import React from "react"; export default class Login extends React.Component { state = { Show: false, Showing: false}; show = () => { if (this.state.Showing) return; this.setState({ Show: true, Showing: true }); setTimeout(() => { this.setState({ Show: false, Showing: false }); }, 3000); }; constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { email: '', password:'', users: [], email_error:'', email_color:'black', pass_error:'', pass_color:'black', redirect: false, message:'', pop:'', }; } componentDidMount() { } render() { return ( <>
